Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Comparatively \Com*par"a*tive*ly\, adv. According to estimate made by comparison; relatively; not positively or absolutely. [1913 Webster]
With but comparatively few exceptions. --Prescott. [1913 Webster]
comparatively adv : in a relative manner; by comparison to something else; "the situation is relatively calm now" [syn: {relatively}]
